docs.summary: Checks whether this order can be refunded.

params.name: orderIds
params.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve invoices.

docs.summary: Retrieves invoices associated with all specified orders.
Retrieves invoices associated with a specified order.

params.name: orderIds
params.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve transactions.

docs.summary: Retrieves transactions associated with all specified orders.
Retrieves transactions associated with a specified order.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Activity item type
One of:
DOWNLOAD_LINK_SENT,
EMAIL_EDITED,
FULFILLER_EMAIL_SENT,
INVOICE_WAS_REMOVED,
INVOICE_WAS_SENT,
INVOICE_WAS_SET,
MERCHANT_COMMENT,
ORDER_FULFILLED,
ORDER_NOT_FULFILLED,
ORDER_PAID,
ORDER_PARTIALLY_PAID,
ORDER_PLACED,
PICKUP_READY_EMAIL_SENT,
SHIPPING_ADDRESS_EDITED,
SHIPPING_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT,
TRACKING_LINK_WAS_SET,
TRACKING_NUMBER_ADDED,
TRACKING_NUMBER_EDITED,
UNSPECIFIED_ORDER_HISTORY_ITEM_TYPE

members.name: payments
members.doc: Payments to be added to order.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions.

members.name: paymentGatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments)

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc: Payment method used for this order

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment provider (e.g., PayPal, Square, Stripe) transaction ID

members.name: refundableByPaymentProvider
members.doc: Whether order can be refunded by payment provider (manually or automatic)

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: item
members.doc: Updated payment. Returned if `return_full_entity` set to `true`.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full payment entity (`results.item`) in the response.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: paymentAndOrderIds
members.doc: Order and payment IDs for which to update payment status.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return the full payment entity (`results.item`) in the response.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
Customer type
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

members.name: type
members.doc:
Deprecated (use identityType instead)
One of:
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
UNSPECIFIED_IDENTITY_TYPE

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being refunded

members.name: quantity
members.doc: How much of that line item is being refunded

members.name: restock
members.doc: Should this item be restocked (used for validation purposes)

members.name: refundShipping
members.doc: Should include shipping in refund calculation

members.name: refundShipping
members.doc: Should include shipping in refund calculation

members.name: items
members.doc: The refundable items of that order

members.name: previouslyRefundedAmount
members.doc: Previous refund given on that order

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Total cost of the order (without tax)

members.name: externalOrderId
members.doc: Reference to an order ID from an external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: externalOrderUrl
members.doc: URL to the order in the external system, as defined in channelInfo (e.g., eBay or Amazon)

members.name: type
members.doc:
Sales channel that submitted the order
One of:
AMAZON,
BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT,
EBAY,
OTHER_PLATFORM,
POS,
UNSPECIFIED,
WEB,
WISH,
WIX_APP_STORE,
WIX_INVOICES

members.name: translatedTitle
members.doc: The title translated according to the buyer language

members.name: value
members.doc: Free text that the customer entered in the custom field during the checkout process

members.name: fileId
members.doc: id of the secure file in media

members.name: identityType
members.doc:
One of:
APP,
CONTACT,
MEMBER,
USER

members.name: _id
members.doc: Fulfillment ID (auto generated upon fulfillment creation).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Information about the line items in the fulfilled order.

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (mirrors the line item index of the order).

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Line item quantity.
On creation, if this parameter isn't passed, the new fulfillment will automatically include all items of this line item that have not already been linked to a fulfillment.
If the order does not have the requested quantity of line items available to add to this fulfillment, the fulfillment will not be created and an error will be returned.
This property will always have a value when returned.

members.name: shippingProvider
members.doc:
Shipping provider. Using the following shipping providers will allow for autofilling the tracking link:
* `fedex`
* `ups`
* `usps`
* `dhl`
* `canadaPost`

members.name: trackingLink
members.doc: Tracking link - autofilled if using a predefined shipping provider, otherwise provided on creation.

members.name: refundablePerItem
members.doc: Whether the order supports refunding per item.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the gift card.

members.name: voided
members.doc: Whether the gift card is voided.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that set the invoice.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: customTextFields
members.doc: Line item custom text field entry

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount applied for this line item

members.name: fulfillerId
members.doc: Line item fulfillerId from stores fulfillers. No value equals self fulfilled

members.name: index
members.doc: Line item ID (auto-generated, stable within this order only)

members.name: lineItemType
members.doc:
Line item type (may be extended)
One of:
CUSTOM_AMOUNT_ITEM,
DIGITAL,
PHYSICAL,
UNSPECIFIED_LINE_ITEM_TYPE

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Primary media for preview of the line item

members.name: productId
members.doc: Line item product ID (optional for POS orders)

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for this line item

members.name: translatedName
members.doc: Product name, translated into the customer's language

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price set for this line item

members.name: totalPrice
members.doc: Total price charged to the customer (per line item) after computation of quantity and discount

members.name: orderIds
members.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve invoices.

members.name: invoicesForOrder
members.doc: List of order IDs and their associated invoices.

members.name: orderIds
members.doc: Order IDs for which to retrieve transactions.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: List of order IDs and their associated transactions.

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID (for media items previously saved in Wix Media)

members.name: altText
members.doc: Alternative text for presentation when media cannot be displayed

members.name: mediaType
members.doc:
Media type
One of:
IMAGE,
UNSPECIFIED_MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: externalTransactionId
members.doc: The transaction id under the membership system. Can be used to void it

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item this membership applies to.

members.name: providerAppId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status
One of:
CHARGED,
CHARGE_FAILED

members.name: activities
members.doc: Log of updates related to the order.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether or not the order was archived.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language to be used when communicating with the customer.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the customer selected (otherwise this defaults to the site language).

members.name: channelInfo
members.doc: Information about the sales channel that submitted this order.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency used for pricing in this store.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc:
Order's current fulfillment status (whether the order received a tracking number or was delivered/picked up).
One of:
CANCELED,
FULFILLED,
NOT_FULFILLED,
PARTIALLY_FULFILLED

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: Date and time of latest update.

members.name: number
members.doc: Order number displayed in the owner's store (auto-generated).

members.name: numericId
members.doc:
Orders unique numeric ID.
Primarily used for sorting and filtering when crawling all orders.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Current status of the payment.
One of:
FULLY_REFUNDED,
NOT_PAID,
PAID,
PARTIALLY_PAID,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
UNSPECIFIED_PAYMENT_STATUS

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc:
Weight unit used in this store.
One of:
KG,
LB,
UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Payment creation date and time. Defaults to current time when not provided.

members.name: refundDisabled
members.doc:
Whether refunds are explicitly disabled.
True means this payment is not refundable.
False means this payment might be refunded (depending on the payment provider).

members.name: amount
members.doc: Refund amount. Not relevant for membership refunds.

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc:
Whether refund is made externally and manually (on the payment provider's side)
When false (default), the payment gateway will be called in order to make an actual refund, and then the payment will be marked as refunded.
When true, the payment will only be *marked* as refunded, and no actual refund will be performed.

members.name: paymentId
members.doc: Specific payment within the order to refund

description: Triggered when a payment is updated.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Refund creation date and time. Defaults to current time when not provided.

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: refundItems
members.doc: Refunded line items and quantities that are part of the created refund.

members.name: restockInfo
members.doc: How to restock items as part of this refund.

members.name: sendOrderRefundedEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

description: Triggered when a refund is created.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: shippingIncluded
members.doc: Whether shipping rate is also refunded.

description: Business model of a refund request

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being refunded.

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally and manually (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: gatewayRefundId
members.doc: ID of the payment gateway refund.

members.name: paymentId
members.doc: ID of the payment associated with this refund.

members.name: providerRefundId
members.doc: ID of the refund in the payment provider's system.

members.name: refundStatus
members.doc:
Refund status.
One of:
FAILED,
PENDING,
SUCCEEDED

members.name: manuallyRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is only refundable manually.
One of:
EXPIRED,
NOT_FOUND,
NOT_SUPPORTED,
OFFLINE

members.name: nonRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is not refundable.
One of:
ACCESS_DENIED,
ALREADY_REFUNDED,
DISABLED_BY_PROVIDER,
INTERNAL_ERROR,
NONE,
NOT_PAID,
PROVIDER_IS_DOWN,
ZERO_PRICE

members.name: refundabilityStatus
members.doc:
Payment refundability status.
One of:
MANUAL,
NOT_REFUNDABLE,
REFUNDABLE

members.name: manuallyRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is only refundable manually.
One of:
EXPIRED,
NOT_FOUND,
NOT_SUPPORTED,
OFFLINE

members.name: nonRefundableReason
members.doc:
Reason why payment is not refundable.
One of:
ACCESS_DENIED,
ALREADY_REFUNDED,
DISABLED_BY_PROVIDER,
INTERNAL_ERROR,
NONE,
NOT_PAID,
PROVIDER_IS_DOWN,
ZERO_PRICE

members.name: gatewayTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID from payment gateway (e.g., Wix Payments, chargeId), what we used to call payment_gateway_transaction_id

members.name: offlinePayment
members.doc: Whether the payment is/was made offline. For example, when using cash or when marked as paid in the Business Manager.

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc:
Payment method. Non-exhaustive list of supported values:
CreditCard, Alipay, AstropayCash, AstropayDBT, AstropayMBT, Bitcoin, BitPay, Cash, ConvenienceStore, EPay, Fake, Giropay, IDeal, InPerson,
Klarna, MercadoPago, Netpay, NordeaSolo, Offline, PagSeguro, PayEasy, PayPal, Paysafecard, Paysafecash, PointOfSale, Poli,
Privat24, Przelewy24, RapidTransfer, Sepa, Skrill, Sofort, Trustly,Neteller, Unionpay, UniPay, Yandex.

members.name: providerTransactionId
members.doc: Transaction ID in the payment provider's system (for example, PayPal, Square, Stripe). Does not exist for offline payments.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: items
members.doc: Restocked line items and quantities, only relevant for `SOME_ITEMS` type.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Restock policy type.
One of:
ALL_ITEMS,
NO_ITEMS,
SOME_ITEMS

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: ID of the line item being restocked.

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code of provided shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup).

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment).

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details (when this object describes pickup).

members.name: shipmentDetails
members.doc: Shipment details (when this object describes shipment).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

members.name: cycleNumber
members.doc: Current cycle number. For example, if the subscription is in the 3rd month of a 4-month subscription, the value will be `3`.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc:
Frequency of recurring payment.
One of:
DAY,
MONTH,
UNDEFINED,
WEEK,
YEAR

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items, before tax.

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: restockInfo
members.doc: How to restock items as part of this refund

members.name: sendOrderRefundedEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

members.name: customMessage
members.doc: Personal note added to the email

members.name: orderId
members.doc: The order this refund related to

members.name: payments
members.doc:
Refund operations information
Currently, only *one* payment refund is supported per request

members.name: restockInfo
members.doc: How to restock items as part of this refund

members.name: sendOrderRefundedEmail
members.doc: Should send a confirmation mail to the customer

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: All order's transactions after the refunds were added

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: status
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
APPROVED,
AUTHORIZED,
CANCELED,
DECLINED,
PARTIALLY_REFUNDED,
PENDING,
PENDING_MERCHANT,
REFUNDED,
UNDEFINED

members.name: orderTransactions
members.doc: Order ID and its associated transactions after update.

members.name: source
members.doc:
Invoice source
One of:
UNSPECIFIED_INVOICE_SOURCE,
WIX

members.name: externalRefund
members.doc: Whether refund was made externally (on the payment provider's side).

members.name: paymentProviderTransactionId
members.doc: Payment provider transaction ID. Used to find refund transaction info on the payment provider's side.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund, given by user (optional).

members.name: type
members.doc:
tax type
One of:
CNPJ,
CPF,
UNSPECIFIED_TAX_TYPE
